title: How to Get Your Kids to Eat Tofu

steps.headline: Buy firm tofu.
steps.description: Soft and medium tofu has more of a flavor, and you do not want to taste it.

steps.headline: Mash the two cups of tofu.
steps.description: It should be mostly smooth but still a little chunky.

steps.headline: Mix with the following ingredients:
steps.description: 2 tablespoons of butter (melted, softened, or mashed) 1/2 cup white sugar 1 teaspoon vanilla extract 1/4 cup finely chopped almonds 1/4 cup chocolate chips.

steps.headline: Serve after dinner.
steps.description: Present it as a new dessert. Act confident, taste it in front of the kids and enjoy it! They will likely follow suit.

steps.headline: Buy soft tofu.
steps.description: Soft tofu loses its taste when cooked.

steps.headline: Find a cake or cookie recipe you wish to make healthier.
steps.description: The tofu will be added to this recipe in place of some of the fat. Cookies may turn out a little weird with this method, but will still work.

steps.headline: Replace half (or all) the oil or butter with tofu.
steps.description: This will reduce the fat greatly and sneak tofu into your kid's dessert.

steps.headline: Mash the tofu thoroughly before putting it in the recipe.
steps.description: Do not use firm or even medium tofu in a recipe. Your recipe will turn out with strange white chunks floating around in it and won't look or taste good.

steps.headline: Bake your recipe normally.
steps.description: The soft tofu will disintegrate into the recipe and be disguised.

steps.headline: Enjoy!
steps.description: And know that your kids are eating tofu and being healthy, without even knowing it!

parts.name: Introducing tofu to a young child

steps.headline: Add tofu into the child's diet early.
steps.description: When your child has been weaned, start introducing them to new foods. Make tofu one of them!

steps.headline: Serve it regularly and different ways.
steps.description: Most meat recipes can be transferred to tofu. Fish and beef recipes usually work the best.
